name: Academy

endp.l1n9cuat.0.591rganky9m.short_descr: Gets the tree of sections / lessons
endp.l1n9cuat.0.591rganky9m.description:
Gets the tree of sections / lessons.

If the `rebuild` flag is `true`, the tree is created from data from DB, otherwise
the data is taken from cache if available.

parameters.name: rebuild
parameters.description: If True, the tree is rebuilt from data

endp.l1n9frkb.0.w281kk0pccf.short_descr: Returns all the courses from the given trainer
endp.l1n9frkb.0.w281kk0pccf.description:
This endpoint returns all the courses of the speicifed trainer via `id_trainer`.

The courses are returned regardless of the `visible` status.

endp.l1n9grj7.0.i3ibs8b8l4.description: This endpoint returns all the courses available (with status == `visible`) ordered by course title

endp.l1n9hl87.0.rw38recv7kt.description:
Returns all academy/course details only if the academy/course is `visible`.

The academy/course can be identified by  `id`.

You can pass more than a field, but one is enough.

This function returns the full `CoursePageDetails` structure

Returns all courses belonging to a student.

parameters.description: Flag T/F. If True, the position is updated even if it is lower than the current one

endp.l1nl7842.0.l4sqnm1uiir.description:
Returns a list of students enrolled in the course specified by `id_course`.

This function returns a list of `UserDetails`

endp.l1nlbh54.0.hpx6m4v8jxi.short_descr: Returns all students in the system
endp.l1nlbh54.0.hpx6m4v8jxi.description: This endpoint returns all the users available (with status == `visible`) ordered by section `position`

parameters.name: id_trainer
parameters.description: The ID of the course the sections belong to

endp.l6hp4yzj.0.f5nari5nef.short_descr: Update order positions of elements in a course
endp.l6hp4yzj.0.f5nari5nef.description:
Massively updates sections and lessons positions inside a course.

The field `updates` is a JSON structure containing

```json
[
   "section_id1": new_pos,
   "section_id2": new_pos,
   "lesson_id1": new_pos, 
   ...
]
```

parameters.name: updates
parameters.description: The array of all sections and lessons to update

endp.l6iq8bs0.0.iuuybmum7r.short_descr: List all resources bound to a lesson
endp.l6iq8bs0.0.iuuybmum7r.description: List all resources added to the lesson specified by `id`.

endp.l6isvx71.0.v4wr6yxubus.short_descr: Deletes a resource from a lesson
endp.l6isvx71.0.v4wr6yxubus.description:
Deletes a resource from a lesson.

Only admin, owner and trainer can delete a resource.

endp.l71grs1f.0.shkw5uzkik.description:
This method adds the courses bought by a user

Challenge is:  [ id_order, transaction_id, session_id ]

endp.l71o20q2.0.xkgtzk97tn.short_descr: Check if a student already enrolled to a course

This function returns the full `Lesson` structure

endp.l7cvxa2k.0.el1xiw391ho.short_descr: Adds a new trainer to a course
endp.l7cvxa2k.0.el1xiw391ho.description: This method allows the course owner (and only the owner) to add a new trainer to a course.

parameters.name: id_course
parameters.description: The course ID to add the trainer to

parameters.name: id_trainer
parameters.description: The user ID of the trainer to add

endp.l7cvzn5j.0.sojvp1anzl.short_descr: Removes a trainer from a course
endp.l7cvzn5j.0.sojvp1anzl.description:
This method allows the course owner (and only the owner) to remove a trainer from a course.
The course owner cannot be removed from the course.

parameters.name: id_course
parameters.description: The course ID to delete the trainer from

parameters.name: id_trainer
parameters.description: The user ID of the trainer to delete

endp.l7cwfzzf.0.nnmqimw4q9c.short_descr: Returns all students connected to the trainer
endp.l7cwfzzf.0.nnmqimw4q9c.description:
This endpoint returns all students connected to the current logged in trainer.

The operation is the following: 

1. list all courses that the trainer owns
2. list all students intersecting courses ids and student enrolls
3. returns all the students with all enrolls

endp.l7ou92gz.0.vh5t6l7eshs.description: This endpoint returns all the courses available (with status == `visible`) ordered by course title that contain the `query` specified.

parameters.name: id_category
parameters.description: The category id to filter by

endp.l8v3ui7j.0.u8pyjeurcs.description:
This is a method that only users with `academy.settings` can call.

It writes the Academy customization settings on database, **overwriting** any settings already present on DB.

The settings are bounded to the current user `domain`.

doc: The `academy` module is responsible of all the functions of the Academy management.
